verses.name: Luke 24:20
verses.text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.

verses.name: Luke 24:21
verses.text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.

verses.name: Luke 24:22
verses.text: Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;

verses.name: Luke 24:23
verses.text: And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.
